casebody.data:
CRAIG
v.
BOARD OF EDUCATION. No. 484PA07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 6, 2008. David A. Nash, Wilmington, for Board of Education.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of November 2007 by Plaintiff to Convert "Petition for Discretionary Review" to a Notice of Appeal of Right:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of March 2008."
